Title: Death Note: The Last Name
Genre: Adventure, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Thriller
Writer: Tsugumi Ôba (original manga), Takeshi Obata (original manga), Tetsuya Oishi (screenplay)
Actors: Tatsuya Fujiwara, Takeshi Kaga, Shidô Nakamura, Erika Toda
Plot: Picking up where the first one leaves off, Light joins the task force searching for Kira in an effort to avert suspicion from himself---and get rid of L.
